description: Marq Daniels is a gorgeous man from Denmark who’s desire to film porn brought him to the Lucas Entertainment set in Spain. Marq has a soft spot for classically handsome men with chiseled features -- so naturally he was handed over to James Castle for a proper Lucas Entertainment introduction. James certainly has chiseled features… especially those perfect cum gutters of his. title: Marq Daniels Makes His Bareback Debut With James Castle
